fields.name: Jordan
fields.description: Hi, I'm Jordan, a passionate developer with a knack for building user-friendly web applications. With expertise in Python, Django, and Bootstrap, I love turning ideas into reality. When I'm not coding, you can find me exploring new tech trends or sipping coffee at my favorite cafÎ˜.

fields.title: Task Manager App
fields.description: A web-based task management tool built with Django and Bootstrap. Features include task creation, categorization, and deadline tracking, with a clean, responsive UI.

fields.title: Personal Blog Platform
fields.description: A dynamic blog platform developed using Python and Django. Supports user authentication, post creation, and commenting functionality, styled with a modern Bootstrap design.
